member.name: T:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.SvgExporter
member.summary: Creates SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics) files from MindFusion.Diagramming diagrams.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.SvgExporter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SvgExporter class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.SvgExporter.Export(MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Diagram,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an SVG file representing the specified diagram.
member.param: A reference to the diagram that will be exported.
The full path to the SVG file.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.SvgExporter.m_bDrawInvisible
member.summary: Specifies whether invisible items should be drawn.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.SvgExporter.InvisibleItems
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether invisible items should be exporter.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.SvgExporter.ExternalImages
member.summary: Specifies whether images displayed by diagram items should be exported to external files.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.SvgExporter.GZipCompression
member.summary: Specifies whether to create GZip compressed SVG.
